title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 197.19 - Operating expense accounts, purpose of
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 197.19 - Operating expense accounts, purpose of

State Regulations

The operating expense accounts (701 to 793) are designed
to show the cost of electric service exclusive of taxes, uncollectible
revenues, and return on investment. (See also ยง
197.33.)

Notes

ยง
197.19

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
